name: Nyphie: Dress up Fashion Queen
description:
More than 1,000 items are available to dress-up your cutie Nyphie doll. You can change cloth, hair, makeup or even the background and SHARE your fashion sense with your friends and family.

Collections:
- Princess & Queen in Ball
- Under the Sea Mermaid
- Witch & Angel (Goddess)
- Land of Oz
- Alice in wonderland
- Snow Queen
- Snow white and hunter
- Traditional costume
- Animal mania (ladybug, queen bee, cute kitty cat, sheep, etc)
- Masquerade mask party
- Flower and Natural
- Myth and nymph
- Academy life
- Magical Petite Girl
- Classic chic modern iconic
- Ghost in Halloween
- Christmas Santa
- Party girls
and so on.

Enjoy and don't forget to give a feedback/review if you like this app.
